DOC.brief_summary: A multi-center, randomized, controlled study of cryoablation vs medical management for the treatment of PAF
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of CryoCorâ„¢ Cryoablation for PAF
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this prospective, randomized multi-center clinical study is to establish the benefits of the CryoCor(TM) Cardiac Cryoablation System for treating symptomatic paroxysmal atrial fibrillation (PAF) in comparison to treatment with anti-arrhythmic medications alone. This study also evaluates the safety profile of the CryoCor(TM) Cardiac Cryoablation System when used in this same setting.
DOC.criteria: At least 3 episodes of PAF within 6 months Refractory to at least one drug Therapeutic anticoagulation Signed informed consent Persistent AF Structural heart disease Prior ablation Contraindication present
